public class PieChart
extends netgest.bo.xwc.framework.components.XUIComponentBase
implements Chart

A XVW component to render a 2D PieChart

Version:
1 To use this component in a XWC Viewer use:
Author:
Pedro Rio

Nested Class Summary
static class PieChart.XEOHTMLRenderer
          The class that renders the Graph in the Viewer (depending on the type, uses HTML+Servlet to render the image or HTML+Flash)

outputChartAsImageToStream

public void outputChartAsImageToStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                       boolean force)
Outputs the rendered chart (as image) to a stream

Specified by:
outputChartAsImageToStream in interface Chart
Parameters:
out - The OutputStream where to write the chart
force - If the chart is of type flash, using the force parameter as true will render the flash chart as an image
